body.p: Respondents generally agreed with the principle that the net interest component should include changes both in the defined benefit obligation and in plan assets that arise from the passage of time. However, some supported the approach proposed in the 2010 ED and others supported the expected return approach used in IAS 19 before the amendments made in 2011 (ie based on the expected return on plan assets).
